message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $950000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for this product. This is a fair price considering my maximum budget and the value I place on this item. Let's see if we can reach a deal!

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $750000 is your maximum budget, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $875000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's true value. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $875000 is closer to my budget, it's still a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product. This is a fair price considering my maximum budget and the value I place on it. Let's see if we can finalize a deal!

I understand that $825000 is your maximum budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $850000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's true value. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to finalize the deal.
